name: Sounds of Somber
description:
Sounds of Somber is a 2D, puzzle-platformer that tells a story about heavy emotions circling loss and grief, and how one can learn to understand and live with those emotions. 

Sounds of Somber was a capstone project for MAGD 488 - Team Projects in the spring semester of 2022 at the University of Wisconsin-Whitewater.  

Sounds of Somber featured a team of 3 programmers, 3 artists, 3 writers, 1 audio engineer, and 2 individuals on the marketing team.
